relation: Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
check out the Neumann Media club, home to the newspaper, radio station, and television studios. www.media.neumann.edu
NU is a private University, so tuition is more on the expensive side.
Join a club. Go to the gym. Attend sports events.
Stay on top of assignments and due dates. Make sure to get out of your dorm room and join some extra circular activities.

Neumann is a small, close knit school for those who aren't attending college to party, but are interested in getting a good degree, meeting new friends, and participating in extra circular activities. Since NU is small compared to other universities, students will have the advantage of getting to know their professors on a first name basis. Teachers also are highly interested in student's benefits and growing intellect.
pageTitle: Neumann University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
